Content-Type: text/plain; charset=utf-8
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable

Hi,
=C2=A0 I fixed the compilation problem for Windows & MSVC. Compiled and=
 ran as expected on a Windows XP & MSVC 2010 setup. You can get it there
ht=
tp://www.marmakoide.org/content/code/index.html

=C2=A0
One oddity for the =
Windows people : if you don't set the random seed manually, the system cloc=
k time will be used as a seed. Thus, 2 instances of the program at the same=
 time, might have the same random seed. Unix builds do not have such an odd=
ity.


Alex


________________________________
 De=C2=A0: afcarl2 <afcarl2@=
yahoo.com>
=C3=80=C2=A0: neat@yahoogroups.com 
Envoy=C3=A9 le : Lundi 21 No=
vembre 2011 4h13
Objet=C2=A0: Re: Re : Re : Re : Re : Re : [neat] Any Prior=
 Applications of NEAT In Which The Genotype Itself Is The Output?
 

=C2=A0=
 


Alex,
I have a couple questions I am hoping you can help me with:
1) Ar=
e you aware of any prior instances of DTRNN cell controller applications as=
 a FEM element response approximator?
2) Are you aware of any references wh=
ich address the effectiveness of the CMA-ES method in instances of small sa=
mple size and high dimensionality?
Thanks,
Andy

sionality?<br>
